duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and research potential brand partners within and outside the beauty/skincare industry.
Develop cohesive proposals for internal teams, covering full scope of deliverables and metrics to measure success of initiatives.
Pitch, negotiate, and execute partnership proposals with potential brand partners.
Craft tailored pitch materials and lead pitching initiatives for brand partnerships across sponsorships, collaborations, co-branding, and co-marketing events.
Assist in building strategic 360 plans and budgets for brand partnership programs.
